description: The Niramaya Scheme in Odisha provides free medicines to all patients visiting government hospitals, ensuring access to essential drugs without financial burden.
key_features: Free medicines at all government hospitals
Implemented across District Headquarters Hospitals, Sub-Divisional Hospitals, Community Health Centres, and Primary Health Centres

benefits.hospital_types: District Headquarters Hospitals, Sub-Divisional Hospitals, Community Health Centres, Primary Health Centres

eligibility.criteria: All patients visiting government hospitals in Odisha

steps: Visit any government hospital in Odisha
Medicines provided free of cost during treatment

special_notes: No formal application required; medicines provided during hospital visits
